variants.Description in input context: c.2954C>T (p.Arg985Trp) - A known pathogenic variant in MYH7 associated with Hereditary Myopathy.

Material used.Description: Patient fibroblasts were cultured and maintained in standard conditions.

Readout description.Result Description: RT-qPCR showed a 75% reduction in MYH7 mRNA transcript levels compared to controls.

Biological replicates.Description: Three independent fibroblast lines from different patients were used.

Technical replicates.Description: Each sample was run in duplicate.

Basic positive control.Description: Fibroblasts from a healthy donor were used as a positive control.

Basic negative control.Description: No-template control was used as a negative control.

Statistical analysis method.Statistical analysis method: Student's t-test was used to compare groups.

Threshold for normal readout.Threshold for normal readout: MYH7 mRNA levels between 2.0 and 5.0 relative to GAPDH.

Threshold for abnormal readout.Threshold for abnormal readout: MYH7 mRNA levels below 2.0 relative to GAPDH.

Material used.Description: Patient fibroblasts were lysed and subjected to Western blotting.

Readout description.Result Description: Western blot analysis revealed a significant reduction in MYH7 protein levels in patient fibroblasts.

Biological replicates.Description: Three independent fibroblast lines from different patients were used.

Technical replicates.Description: Each sample was run in duplicate.

Basic positive control.Description: Fibroblasts from a healthy donor were used as a positive control.

Basic negative control.Description: No-template control was used as a negative control.

Statistical analysis method.Statistical analysis method: Student's t-test was used to compare groups.

Threshold for normal readout.Threshold for normal readout: MYH7 protein levels greater than 80% of control.

Threshold for abnormal readout.Threshold for abnormal readout: MYH7 protein levels less than 50% of control.
